input.description: CSV samplesheet with columns: sample_name,alignment,index. Path to the input samplesheet file.

start.description: Start position of the region to visualize. Required parameter.

end.description: End position of the region to visualize. Required parameter.

sv_type.description: Type of structural variant (e.g., 'DEL', 'DUP', 'INV'). Required parameter.

window.description: Window size around the region to display. Optional parameter.

max_depth.description: Maximum read depth to display. Optional parameter.

plot_height.description: Height of the output plot in pixels. Optional parameter.

plot_width.description: Width of the output plot in pixels. Optional parameter.

include_mqual.description: Include mapping quality information. Optional parameter.

output_file.description: Custom name for the output PNG file. Optional parameter.

reference.description: Path to reference genome FASTA file. Optional parameter.

transcript_file.description: Path to transcript annotation file (e.g., GTF/GFF). Optional parameter.

transcript_file_index.description: Path to transcript annotation file index. Optional parameter.

annotation_files.description: Space-separated list of annotation files to overlay on the plot. Optional parameter.

annotation_files_index.description: Space-separated list of annotation files index. Optional parameter.
